segments.text: Observing this, the woman's deep in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, sink filling up unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over, creating a sheet down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens, her shoe submerged without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Counter has dishes waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window reveals a peaceful yard with plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, cabinets open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's adventurous, stretching for the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl below, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears with the slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief adds a spark to the ordinary day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the dangers lurk, hidden in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic case of unaware domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR
